edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_prog_assgment

Class GraphicalUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_prog_assgment.UserInterface
      • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.final_prog_assgment.GraphicalUI

  • public class GraphicalUI
extends UserInterface
    This Class is the Implementation of the Option GUI Interface for the Program

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  GraphicalUI.FileNameQueryDialog
      This inner class is for the GUI only to Request the Filename of the new Save file, and verify the Path before closing.
      (package private) class  GraphicalUI.ResolutionQueryDialog
      This inner class is for the GUI only, to request the Resolution from the User, and verify the number before closing

        Parameters:
